## Price interface

Price is deprecated, replaced by ProductPrice. The Price object defines the price of a product as well as any tax-related adjustments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Price 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [adjustments?](./magento-api.price.adjustments.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[PriceAdjustment](./magento-api.priceadjustment.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array that provides information about tax, weee, or weee\_tax adjustments. |
|  [amount?](./magento-api.price.amount.md) | Maybe&lt;[Money](./magento-api.money.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price of a product plus a three-letter currency code. |
